search.inputPlaceholder: Enter keywords to search kids videos, e.g.: animals, math, stories...
search.resultsSubtitle: We've selected the most suitable video content for children
search.emptyDescription: Enter keywords in the search box above to find videos suitable for children

balanced.name: Balanced Mode
balanced.description: For ages 3-6, balancing education and entertainment

video.deleteConfirmText: Are you sure you want to delete this video?

settings.title: App Settings
settings.apiKeyRequired: API keys are essential for using intelligent filtering features. You need to configure at least one AI service provider's API key. All keys are securely stored locally and will not be uploaded to any server.
settings.customPromptHelp: Custom filter prompts are advanced features, recommended for experienced users. Incorrect prompts may affect filtering effectiveness.

favorites.title: My Favorites
favorites.emptySubtitle: Go to search page to discover more exciting content!
favorites.notePlaceholder: Add your notes or comments for this video...

help.title: User Guide
help.quickStartDesc: Learn how to quickly start using Kids Video Smart Filter
help.featuresDesc: Explore the powerful features and highlights of the app
help.apiSetupDesc: Learn how to configure AI service API keys
help.troubleshootingDesc: Solve common problems encountered during usage
help.contactDesc: Get technical support and feedback channels

messages.searchFailed: Search failed, please check network connection and API settings
messages.settingsSaveFailed: Failed to save settings, please retry
messages.apiTestFailed: API connection failed, please check if the key is correct

tips.title: Usage Tips
tips.apiSetup: For first use, please configure AI service API keys in Settings page
tips.searchKeywords: Recommend using specific keywords for search, like "kids math education"
tips.filterModes: You can choose different filter modes for different age groups
tips.favorites: Favorites feature helps you save videos your kids like
tips.developmentMode: Currently in frontend development mode, using mock data for demonstration

player.watchDuration: Recommended viewing time should not exceed 30 minutes
player.aiAnalysisNote: This score is generated by AI intelligent analysis for reference only. Parents should make judgments based on their children's actual situation.
